"Operacion de Limpieza Urbana":
"A state of emergency has been declared.
Darkers are occupying parts of the Arks
Ship's Urbano sector. All ARKS members
are to immediately prepare for combat.
Break the occupation and exterminate all
Darkers within the Urbano sector.
――――――――――――――――――――
Reúne [500] Puntos de misión by
exterminating Darkers.
Fracaso: Cuando expira el limite de tiempo"

"Exterminar a los Darkers
Colecciona puntos de misión!"
